# Mobilizing Justice Document Template

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This template can be used to create documents for project Mobilizing Justice

To create a new article using this format:

``` bash
quarto use template paezha/mj-report
```

This will install the extension and create an example qmd file that you can use as a starting place for your document.
